abstract: Marceline Loridan-Ivens writes about her life during Nazi occupied France and her time as Auschwitz-Birkenau camp prisoner in soon-to-be released English-language translation of memoir But You Did Not Come Back; Left Bank resident and outspoken critic of France’s anti-Semitic culture says terrorist attacks in Paris stem from French society's apathy to bias against Jews.
